_sText:
=====General Information=====
Name: ba_stadium
Game: Counter-Strike: Source
Version: 1.1
Author: [Jett]-Willow
Author Email: iammatt@gmail.com
Website: http://www.nothinginc.net
Players: 10+ Recommended, 40 Max

===Release Changes for 1.1==
- Added more cover on right side to make less prone to snipers.
- Changed vehicle models in middle for more cover
- Added barrels in middle to provide cover, and physics fun
- Added advertising for JettLan 3 (http://www.jettlan.net)

=====Map Information========
Program: ValveHammerEditor 4.0
Textures Used:  Standard HL2/CSS Textures
Build Time:  2 Hours (1 Hour For 1.1 Revision)
Compiler:  Standard Valve Hammer Editor , Map Compiling Tools
Compile Time:  4 Minutes 57 Seconds (Original Build), 2 Minutes 3 Seconds for 1.1 Revision

             Compile Computer Specs
CPU:     AMD Barton 2500+ (OCed to 2.2ghz)
RAM:     1024 MB Crucial PC2700 DDR
HDD:     120GB Seagate SATA
GFX:      Nvidia FX5900XT

======Other Information=====
ba_stadium is a BattleArena map for CounterStrikeSource.  This specific BattleArena map takes place in a large stadium.
There are various walls and dividers around the map for cover, along with numerous cars.  BattleArena maps focus on
fast gameplay, frantic firefights, and close knit teamwork to kill the other team as quick as possible.  Be sure to check
out other upcoming BattleArena maps from us!

==Installation Instructions=
Extract the files in this archive to your CSTRIKE FOLDER map directory, or simply extract anywhere you'd like and place them in the example directory below..  The following is an exampleof where it may go: "C:\Program Files\Steam\Steam Apps\xxxx@xxx.xxx\counter-strike source\cstrike".
